news.content: I will present our project Whole Brain Imaging at the International C.elegans [conference](https://genetics-gsa.org/celegans2023) 2023.
Our work on constructing a galactic dustmap with minimal impact on cosmology is published in the [Astrophysical Journal](https://iopscience.iop.org/article/10.3847/1538-4357/acc32c).

Our work on quantifying the effect of high-dimensional non-Gaussianity to statistical probes in cosmology is published in the [Astrophysical Journal](https://iopscience.iop.org/article/10.3847/1538-4357/acbe3b).
